ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 173
ygData.msgSnippet: I tried to give gold to Rathaman while invis and alos in WOLFFORM (high lvl druid friend) and both times I got attacked. .  .they fixed it, good luck getting
ygData.messageBody:
I tried to give gold to Rathaman while invis and alos in WOLFFORM (high lvl druid friend) and both times I got attacked. . .they fixed it, good luck getting your faction up.

----- Original Message -----
From: Dicey
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Thursday, November 04, 1999 9:38 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Digest Number 173


I was in fact able to finish a quest while invisible. I was in Qeynos and
everything there is ready to attack. I was trying to raise faction, so i
was doing the quest where you give 2 gold to Den Magason by the docks.
After I gave him the money I got some blank scrolls that I didn't need
because I was only doing the quest for faction. I had a friend with me that
was hailing him to keep him from wandering away. My friend said that after
I gave the NPC the 2 gold the first time that I became visible. I still had
the gather Shadows icon and no one was rushing over to kill me. Other PC's
could see me, but the NPC's couldn't. I was able to sit there and give him
enough to get to threateningly before my Invis finally did wear off. The
odd part was that I did NOT get the warning that I was about to appear and
thus I had no time to run away and I did die. But the point is that I WAS
able to give gold and receive quest items back while invis. This was about
1 month ago. Since I was visible to PC's and didn't get a warning, it seems
to me that they intend for you to become visible and because of that, it may
have been fixed in any one of the patches since then. I will try to do
another quest invis and let you all know if it still works.

-----Original Message-----
From: Aazen1@... [mailto:Aazen1@...]
Sent: Thursday, November 04, 1999 10:13 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Digest Number 173


From: Aazen1@...

I think that initiating in a trade will remove your invisibility.But it may
be possible that being invisible will allow you to complete a quest.For
instance, if you have the Hide skill, going hidden will change an NPCs
faction with you to indifferent.Maybe the same works with Invisibility.

Sorry if this was sent twice,
Aazen SyVex

In a message dated 11/3/99 4:34:40 AM Pacific Standard Time,
EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com writes:

<< Has anybody else attempted to complete this quest ?
or does anyone have confirmation if quests can be completed
while invis ? pls email me directly as I dont always get the time
to read all this list mails... >>
